metadata.Title: CVE-2020-15472 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: In nDPI through 3.2, the H.323 dissector is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer over-read in ndpi_search_h323 in lib/protocols/h323.c, as demonstrated by a payload packet length that is too short.

criterions.comment: ndpi: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
